Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on taking the first steps towards starting your new business! Here are the details of your scheduled consultation with the attorney:
Attorney Name: Chike Okpara, Esq. Date/time: --- Details: I will call you at --- and connect you with Chike.
If you have any questions or need to reschedule your consultation, please call me directly at (855) 787-1951, Monday–Friday from 6 am – 6pm PT or simply reply to his message. If I’m unavailable, you can also email bizhelp@legalzoom.com to reach the next available member of my team.
As your dedicated account manager, I'll be your primary point of contact for all your business formation needs. My commitment to you is this—I will do whatever possible to help make sure you have the right information to make the best decisions for you—and hopefully, I can also help save you money in the process!
Thank you for reaching out to the LegalZoom Business Starter Team. I look forward to speaking with you soon.
{!User.FirstName} Business Account Manager (855) 787-1951 {!User.Phone} BizHelp@legalzoom.com
Consultation Terms: The consultation and Roadmap are provided by an independent attorney, and this email may be deemed attorney advertising. This email is not a lawyer referral service.
